Title: Don't Cook Now
Plot: Carrie, Rose, Oscar and Frank discover that a memory wipe they performed on Mrs King is about to fail, when she starts to be convinced she is a spy. Frank gives the agents a new mission: monitor Mrs King because if the memory wipe fails, they will be finished in MI9. Oscar comes up with a plan to trick Mrs King into believing that St. Hope's is an MI9 training facility and that all the students are spies. Mrs King meets a supposed SKUL agent, who turns out really is working for SKUL! The agents
